content: What if your AI didn’t just think — but could feel you?We taught AI how to process data.Now, we’re teaching it to understand emotions.Welcome to Artificial Emotional Intelligence (AEI) — where machines sense your frustration, recognize your excitement, and respond with empathy.Picture this: • A chatbot sensing you’re upset before you type it out. • A virtual assistant offering calm when it detects stress in your voice. • An AI therapist that understands your loneliness better than your friends.This isn’t science fiction.It’s happening right now.Question for you:Would you be comfortable trusting an AI that understands your emotions better than most humans?Let’s open this up — I’d love to hear your take. Drop your thoughts below.Because the future isn’t just AI-powered.
